_source.text: After a refresher course in Paris, off I went to Brest, and after spending a day snickering about the city's name, I then stumbled innocently upon something even better than French verbs: French food!

text: the city's **name**, I then stumbled innocently upon something even **better** **than** French verbs: French food!

_source.text: A free subdomain will do, but having your own domain name is better and highly recommended.
